WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_CSS55_AR_ZNAHYRLOAD
WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: These workflows are created from the Workflow Generation Wizard.

SESSION.NAME: s_m_CSS55_AR_ZNAHYRLOAD
SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This wf will read css55znarhrchy.tmp located in the Temp folder and fill the data in the following tables: CSS55LF10T CSS55LF11T CSS55LF18T CSS55LF19T

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_CSS55_AR_ZNAHYRLOAD
TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This wf will read css55znarhrchy.tmp located in the Temp folder and fill the data in the following tables: CSS55LF10T CSS55LF11T CSS55LF18T CSS55LF19T

WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_CSS55_AR_PRE_DIMABROK_DIMAIOBPAR
WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: These workflows are created from the Workflow Generation Wizard.

SESSION.NAME: s_m_CSS55_AR_PRE_DIMABROK_DIMAIOBPAR
SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This workflow needs css55ardimaBROK.asc and css55ardimaiobpar.asc to generate css55brkr.tmp and css55dimaiobpr.tmp. The inputfiles need to be located in the Source folder and will be exported to the Temp folder so that these files can be used by wf_CSS55_AR_PREPARE.

Fail task if any command fails
Fail task if any command fails

TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_CSS55_AR_PRE_DIMABROK_DIMAIOBPAR
TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This workflow needs css55ardimaBROK.asc and css55ardimaiobpar.asc to generate css55brkr.tmp and css55dimaiobpr.tmp. The inputfiles need to be located in the Source folder and will be exported to the Temp folder so that these files can be used by wf_CSS55_AR_PREPARE.

WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_CSS55_AR_NON_COMISSION
WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: These workflows are created from the Workflow Generation Wizard.

SESSION.NAME: s_m_CSS55_AR_NON_COMISSION
SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This wf uses css55arprprdt.tmp generated by wf_CSS55_AR_PREPARE and css55argwp.tmp generated by wf_CSS55_AR_GWP as input from the Temp folder to calculate the GWP and ARtotals, and outputs the data to the files css01cntrlfdt.tmp css55XPUNC031.out css55XPUNC032.out css55XPUNC041.out css55XPUNC042.out which will be loaded into the tables css55ff03t0001, css55ff03t0002, css55ff04t0001, css55ff04t0002 and css01lf01t.

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Fail task if any command fails
Fail task if any command fails
Fail task if any command fails
Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_CSS55_AR_NON_COMISSION
TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This wf uses css55arprprdt.tmp generated by wf_CSS55_AR_PREPARE and css55argwp.tmp generated by wf_CSS55_AR_GWP as input from the Temp folder to calculate the GWP and ARtotals, and outputs the data to the files css01cntrlfdt.tmp css55XPUNC031.out css55XPUNC032.out css55XPUNC041.out css55XPUNC042.out which will be loaded into the tables css55ff03t0001, css55ff03t0002, css55ff04t0001, css55ff04t0002 and css01lf01t.

WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_CSS55_AR_BROKLOAD
WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: These workflows are created from the Workflow Generation Wizard.

SESSION.NAME: s_m_CSS55_AR_BROKLOAD
SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This wf loads the broker Id's from css55brkr.tmp which is generated by wf_CSS55AR_PRE_DIMABROK_DIMAIOBPAR and get's their description from css12LF55t which is loaded by wf_CSS12_AR_CUSTLOAD. It outputs the data to a file css55XPUBrokl.out which is then loaded by XPU in the table CSS55LF22T.

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Fail task if any command fails
Fail task if any command fails
Fail task if any command fails
Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_CSS55_AR_BROKLOAD
TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This wf loads the broker Id's from css55brkr.tmp which is generated by wf_CSS55AR_PRE_DIMABROK_DIMAIOBPAR and get's their description from css12LF55t which is loaded by wf_CSS12_AR_CUSTLOAD. It outputs the data to a file css55XPUBrokl.out which is then loaded by XPU in the table CSS55LF22T.

SESSION.NAME: s_m_CSS00_AR_HEADER_CLEANSING
SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This wf generates css55outfile1.tmp from css00arsapext.asc. The outputfile will be exported to the Temp folder so that it can be used by wf_CSS55_AR_PREPARE. The inputfile has to be located in the Source folder.

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_CSS00_AR_HEADER_CLEANSING
TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This wf generates css55outfile1.tmp from css00arsapext.asc. The outputfile will be exported to the Temp folder so that it can be used by wf_CSS55_AR_PREPARE. The inputfile has to be located in the Source folder.

SOURCE.NAME: FIL_CLEANSE_SRC
SOURCE.DESCRIPTION: GENERATED SOURCE FOR Discard marked rows, allowing real data and not SAP metadata to continue-TRANSFORMATION.

SOURCE.NAME: EXP_LENGHT_SRC
SOURCE.DESCRIPTION: GENERATED SOURCE FOR Inspects the rows to determine which one will proceed an which one will be discarded. We also take the key date from the first row and add it to each row.-TRANSFORMATION.

TARGET.NAME: FIL_CLEANSE_TGT
TARGET.DESCRIPTION: GENERATED TARGET FOR Discard marked rows, allowing real data and not SAP metadata to continue-TRANSFORMATION.

TARGET.NAME: EXP_LENGHT_TGT
TARGET.DESCRIPTION: GENERATED TARGET FOR Inspects the rows to determine which one will proceed an which one will be discarded. We also take the key date from the first row and add it to each row.-TRANSFORMATION.

TRANSFORMATION.NAME: FIL_CLEANSE
TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Discard marked rows, allowing real data and not SAP metadata to continue

TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_LENGHT
TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Inspects the rows to determine which one will proceed an which one will be discarded. We also take the key date from the first row and add it to each row.

TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: ROW_HEADER
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(( (SUBSTR(COMPLETE_ROW,1,length('---------------'))='---------------')) OR (SUBSTR(COMPLETE_ROW,1,length('| CoCd BPartner'))='| CoCd BPartner') OR (SUBSTR(COMPLETE_ROW,1,length('|* '))='|* ') OR (SUBSTR(COMPLETE_ROW,1,length('| '))='| '), 0, 1)
